name: Safe Space (briefjoe, Sun Jeong)
description:
Safe Space is a hair-raising exploration - interactive story.

The game is for audiences of age 18 and above. This game contains topics of child abuse and self-harm and depicts the use of alcohol and tobacco. 

Gameplay

Point and click

Controls

Arrow keys / WASD keys

Mouse (left-click)

Game Length

30 minutes or less.
